attributes.title: Had to wipe my phone
attributes.review: Tho app sent my number to a bunch of other people and lead to my number getting leaked if you want to keep your information private do not get this app

attributes.title: Tik tok is better
attributes.review: This app took 69 weeks to download, but I know a way better app than this that everyone should download it’s called tik tok, it downloads way faster and it doesn’t have an orange faced person on the front 💖🧚🏼‍♀️💕

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i just don’t like the app, it took 1 hour to download and my storage got full immediately, support your minorities and don’t waste your time in this app, everyone stick together and don’t download this. 🥴

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus. i had to get a completely new phone. i am very angry that trumps app is supposed to be a good app for campaigning and updates, but it destroyed my phone. i now have none of my pictures or data!! HORRIBLE.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: It took so long to download. After three agonizing  days of waiting the app was finally ready to open. When I opened it all I saw was this weirdly distorted picture of a Cheeto????? I wish I could give zero stars

attributes.title: Doesnt work
attributes.review: I was promised if I downloaded this it would make America great again. Did not work. It has gotten worse. 0/10 would not recommend very disappointed and dissatisfied

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This is horrendous this app is the worst. When I opened it my phone went black and I couldn’t turn it on for a week and when I did all my accounts were hacked deleted and wiped a lil fishy don’t ya think 😉

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: this app took a whole week to download and it’s not my WiFi. Then when I finally open it there was so many types of glitches in the app. But what do I expect, I got a app from a man who paid someone to take his SAT.

attributes.title: I can’t believe how bad it was
attributes.review: It was so bad everything was confusing and the things on there made me feel unsafe. Please don’t download not worth the time and energy. Literally the worst idea in the world

attributes.title: Hacked
attributes.review: When I downloaded this garbage app I was immediately bombarded being an idiot, like I literally felt myself getting dumber as the seconds ticked by. Thankfully I can delete the app so hopefully the grossness wears off but we’ll see.
